price: Quien haya realizado una obra de bien, tan pequeña como un átomo, la encontrará registrada.
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
